channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump team derails Baltimore-D.C. high-speed plan
item.description: The Transportation Department said Friday it canceled grants for the "doomed" Baltimore-D.C. high-speed rail project.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: House panel agrees to delay Maxwell interview but won't grant immunity
item.description: House investigators agreed to delay interviewing Epstein associate Ghislaine Maxwell until after the Supreme Court reviews her conviction on sex traff...

item.title: Corporation for Public Broadcasting starts shutting down
item.description: The Corporation for Public Broadcasting is shutting down after President Trump successfully rescinded funding for public broadcasting.

item.title: Washington Times Weekly: The 'Rule of Five' in action
item.description: I'm George Gerbo and thanks for joining us for this edition of Washington Times Weekly, where we get the chance to sit down with our reporters and tal...

item.title: Senate session heads into overtime as Democrats stall votes on Trump nominees
item.description: The Senate is beginning to work into its scheduled summer break as a partisan dispute over quickly confirming President Trump's nominees derailed the ...

item.title: DHS Launches $600 Million Grant Program for State Detention Centers
item.description: The new grant program will support states in building detention centers for illegal aliens, similar to the new facility in the Florida Everglades, as ...

item.title: Louisville Revises Sanctuary Policies: Early Indicator of Growing Trend?

item.title: Illegal Alien Felons Won’t Get Taxpayer-Funded Legal Aid in California, and Activists are Fuming
item.description: In a minor positive step, California ends state-funded legal aid for illegal aliens with felony convictions. The radical groups getting paid to defend...

item.title: Two Illegal Aliens with Lengthy Criminal Backgrounds Suspected in NYC Shooting

item.title: Illegal Alien Stages Kidnapping Hoax to Slander Immigration Enforcement

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
